content: After collecting the Loong Scales in Chapter 2, return to Chapter 1 to find Red Loong. From the Outside the Forest Keeper's Shrine in Forest of Wolves, head to the nearby waterfalls. With the Scales in your possession, you can now enter the waterfall and fight Red Loong.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 1', specifically from the subsection 'Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
After collecting the Loong Scales in Chapter 2, return to Chapter 1 to find Red Loong. From the Outside the Forest Keeper's Shrine in Forest of Wolves, head to the nearby waterfalls. With the Scales in your possession, you can now enter the waterfall and fight Red Loong.
